Rule.Filter: (([way_area]>=20000) and ([way_area]<80000) and not (([natural]='lake') or ([natural]='water') or ([landuse]='reservoir') or ([landuse]='water')))
(([way_area]>=80000) and ([way_area]<150000) and not (([natural]='lake') or ([natural]='water') or ([landuse]='reservoir') or ([landuse]='water')))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified')) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified')) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified') ) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified') ) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified') ) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified') ) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified') ) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified') ) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified') ) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: other-road
Rule.Filter: (((([highway]='living_street') or ([highway]='residential') or ([highway]='minor') or ([highway]='unclassified') ) and not ([tunnel]='yes')) or (([highway]='service') and not (([service]='parking_aisle') or ([tunnel]='yes'))))

Rule.name: mtb-track-scale-4-to-6
Rule.Filter: ([offsetside] = -1 and ([mtb:scale]='4' or [mtb:scale]='4+' or [mtb:scale]='4-' or [mtb:scale]='5' or [mtb:scale]='5+' or [mtb:scale]='5-' or [mtb:scale]='6' or [mtb:scale]='6+' or [mtb:scale]='6-'))

Rule.name: mtb-track-scale-4-to-6
Rule.Filter: ([offsetside] = -1 and ([mtb:scale]='4' or [mtb:scale]='4+' or [mtb:scale]='4-' or [mtb:scale]='5' or [mtb:scale]='5+' or [mtb:scale]='5-' or [mtb:scale]='6' or [mtb:scale]='6+' or [mtb:scale]='6-'))

Rule.name: mtb-track-scale-4-to-6
Rule.Filter: ([offsetside] = 1 and ([mtb:scale]='4' or [mtb:scale]='4+' or [mtb:scale]='4-' or [mtb:scale]='5' or [mtb:scale]='5+' or [mtb:scale]='5-' or [mtb:scale]='6' or [mtb:scale]='6+' or [mtb:scale]='6-'))

Rule.name: mtb-track-scale-4-to-6
Rule.Filter: ([offsetside] = 1 and ([mtb:scale]='4' or [mtb:scale]='4+' or [mtb:scale]='4-' or [mtb:scale]='5' or [mtb:scale]='5+' or [mtb:scale]='5-' or [mtb:scale]='6' or [mtb:scale]='6+' or [mtb:scale]='6-'))
(([aerialway]='cable_car') or ([aerialway]='gondola') or ([aerialway]='chair_lift') or ([aerialway]='drag_lift') or ([aerialway]='t-bar') or ([aerialway]='platter') or ([aerialway]='goods'))

Rule.name: water-area
Rule.Filter: (([natural]='lake') or ([natural]='water') or ([landuse]='basin') or ([waterway]='dock') or ([landuse]='reservoir') or ([landuse]='water') or ([waterway]='mill_pond') or ([waterway]='riverbank') or ([waterway]='canal'))

Rule.name: water-area
Rule.Filter: (([natural]='lake') or ([natural]='water') or ([landuse]='basin') or ([waterway]='dock') or ([landuse]='reservoir') or ([landuse]='water') or ([waterway]='mill_pond') or ([waterway]='riverbank') or ([waterway]='canal'))

Rule.name: water-area
Rule.Filter: ((([natural]='lake') or ([natural]='water') or ([landuse]='basin') or ([waterway]='dock') or ([landuse]='reservoir') or ([landuse]='water') or ([waterway]='mill_pond') or ([waterway]='riverbank') or ([waterway]='canal')) and ([way_area]>=100000))

Rule.name: water-area
Rule.Filter: (([natural]='lake') or ([natural]='water') or ([landuse]='basin') or ([waterway]='dock') or ([landuse]='reservoir') or ([landuse]='water') or ([waterway]='mill_pond') or ([waterway]='riverbank') or ([waterway]='canal'))

Datasource.Parameter: (select way,aeroway,amenity,landuse,leisure,man_made,military,"natural",power,tourism,name from planet_osm_polygon where landuse is not null or leisure is not null or aeroway in ('apron','aerodrome') or amenity in ('parking','university','college','school','hospital','kindergarten','grave_yard') or military = 'barracks' or "natural" in ('field','beach','heath','mud','wood','fell','scrub','glacier') or power in ('station','sub_station') or tourism in ('attraction','camp_site','caravan_site','picnic_site','zoo') order by z_order,way_area desc ) as leisure
(select way,landuse,leisure, military from planet_osm_polygon where (landuse = 'military' or leisure='nature_reserve' or military = 'danger_area') and building is null ) as landuse_overlay
(select way,leisure from planet_osm_polygon where leisure in ('sports_centre','stadium', 'pitch') order by z_order,way_area desc) as sports_grounds

(select way,waterway,disused,name, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel from planet_osm_line where waterway in ('weir','river','canal','derelict_canal','stream','drain') and (bridge is null or bridge not in ('yes','true','1','aqueduct')) order by z_order ) as water_lines_casing

(select way,"natural",waterway,landuse,name,way_area from planet_osm_polygon where waterway in ('dock','mill_pond','riverbank','canal') or landuse in ('reservoir','water','basin') or "natural" in ('lake','water','land','marsh','wetland') order by z_order,way_area desc ) as water_areas

(select way,waterway,disused,name, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel from planet_osm_line where waterway in ('weir','river','canal','derelict_canal','stream','drain') and (bridge is null or bridge not in ('yes','true','1','aqueduct')) order by z_order ) as water_lines_fill
(select way,waterway,name from planet_osm_line where waterway in ('river','canal','stream','drain') ) as water_lines_text

(select way,"natural",waterway,landuse,name from planet_osm_polygon where waterway in ('dock','mill_pond','riverbank','canal') or landuse in ('reservoir','water','basin') or "natural" in ('lake','water') order by z_order,way_area desc ) as water_areas_fill
(select way,name from planet_osm_line where waterway='dam') as dam
(select way from planet_osm_polygon where man_made='pier') as piers
(select way from planet_osm_line where man_made='pier') as piers

(select way,highway from planet_osm_line where highway in ('motorway','motorway_link','trunk','trunk_link','primary','primary_link','secondary','secondary_link','tertiary','residential','unclassified','minor') and tunnel in ('yes','true','1') order by z_order) as roads
(select way from planet_osm_point where highway='turning_circle') as turning_circle
(select way,highway,foot,bicycle from planet_osm_line where highway in ('bridleway','footway','cycleway','path') and tunnel in ('yes','true','1') order by z_order) as roads

(select way,tracktype from planet_osm_line where (highway='track' or (highway='cycleway' and tracktype is not null)) and (bridge is null or bridge in ('no','false','0')) and (tunnel is null or tunnel in ('no','false','0'))) as tracks
(select way,tracktype from planet_osm_line where (highway='track' or (highway='cycleway' and tracktype is not null)) and tunnel in ('yes','true','1')) as tracks

(select way,building,leisure,railway,amenity,aeroway from planet_osm_polygon where building is not null or leisure in ('pitch','track') or railway='station' or amenity='place_of_worship' or aeroway='terminal' order by z_order,way_area desc) as buildings
(select way,barrier,"natural",man_made from planet_osm_line where barrier is not null or "natural" in ('hedge','cliff') or man_made='embankment') as roads
(select way,barrier,"natural" from planet_osm_polygon where barrier is not null or "natural"='hedge') as barriers
(select way,highway from planet_osm_polygon where highway in ('residential','unclassified','pedestrian','service','footway','track') order by z_order,way_area desc) as roads

(select way,highway,service, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel from planet_osm_line where highway in ('motorway','motorway_link','trunk','trunk_link','primary','primary_link','secondary','secondary_link','tertiary','residential','unclassified','minor','road','service','pedestrian','raceway','living_street') order by z_order) as roads
(select way,highway from planet_osm_polygon where highway in ('residential','unclassified','pedestrian','service','footway','living_street','track') order by z_order,way_area desc) as roads

(select way,highway,bicycle,foot,construction,aeroway,service,electrified, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel, case when bridge in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else bridge end as bridge, case when railway in ('spur','siding') or (railway='rail' and service in ('spur','siding','yard')) then 'spur-siding-yard'::text else railway end as railway from planet_osm_line where highway is not null or aeroway in ('runway','taxiway') or railway in ('light_rail','narrow_gauge','funicular','rail','subway','tram','spur','siding','platform','disused','abandoned','construction') order by z_order) as roads
(select way,aerialway from planet_osm_line where aerialway is not null) as aerialways
(select way,highway from planet_osm_roads where highway in ('motorway', 'trunk', 'primary', 'secondary', 'motorway_link', 'trunk_link', 'primary_link', 'secondary_link') order by z_order ) as roads

(select way,highway,service,electrified, case when tunnel in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else tunnel end as tunnel, case when railway in ('spur','siding') or (railway='rail' and service in ('spur','siding','yard')) then 'spur-siding-yard'::text else railway end as railway from planet_osm_roads where highway in ('motorway', 'trunk', 'primary', 'secondary', 'motorway_link', 'trunk_link', 'primary_link', 'secondary_link') or railway is not null order by z_order ) as roads
(select way,name from planet_osm_line where waterway='canal' and bridge in ('yes','true','1','aqueduct') order by z_order) as water

(select way,highway,aeroway,railway,layer,bicycle,foot,bridge from planet_osm_line where (highway is not null or aeroway in ('runway','taxiway') or railway in ('light_rail','subway')) and bridge not in ('no','false','0') order by z_order ) as roads
(select way,tracktype from planet_osm_line where (highway='track' or (highway='cycleway' and tracktype is not null)) and bridge in ('yes','true','1')) as tracks
(select way from planet_osm_line where railway='tram' and (tunnel is null or tunnel not in ('yes','true','1'))) as trams

(select bicycle, lcn_ref, rcn_ref, ncn_ref, lcn, rcn, ncn, osm_id, route, way, highway, ref from planet_osm_line where ((highway='cycleway') or (lcn_ref is not null) or (rcn_ref is not null) or (ncn_ref is not null) or (lcn is not null) or (rcn is not null) or (ncn is not null))) as cycleway
(select osm_id,way,"mtb:scale","mtb:scale:uphill", offsetside, highway, tracktype from planet_osm_routes2 where ("mtb:scale" is not null or "mtb:scale:uphill" is not null)) as mtb_basic
(select osm_id,way,"class:bicycle:mtb" from planet_osm_line where "class:bicycle:mtb" is not null) as class_bicycle_mtb
(select osm_id,way, access, bicycle from planet_osm_line where bicycle is not null) as nobicycle

(select osm_id,way,incline,"mtb:scale:uphill", "mtb:scale" from planet_osm_line where (("mtb:scale:uphill" in ('3', '4', '5') and incline in ('up','down')) or ("mtb:scale" in ('2-', '2', '2+', '3-', '3', '3+', '4-', '4', '4+', '5-', '5', '5+') and incline in ('up','down')))) as mtb_incline
(select way from planet_osm_point where warning is not null) as mtbwarning
(select osm_id,way,access,highway from planet_osm_line where access is not null and (bicycle is null or bicycle not in ('no', 'private', 'destination', 'yes', 'designated', 'permissive'))) as access
(select way,name,railway,aerialway,disused from planet_osm_point where railway in ('station','halt','tram_stop') or aerialway='station' ) as stations
(select way,name,railway,aerialway,disused from planet_osm_polygon where railway in ('station','halt','tram_stop') or aerialway='station' ) as stations

(select way,power, case when replace(split_part(voltage,';',1), '000000', '')<>split_part(voltage,';',1) then replace(split_part(voltage,';',1), '000000', '') || ' MV' when replace(split_part(voltage,';',1), '000', '')<>split_part(voltage,';',1) then replace(split_part(voltage,';',1), '000', '') || ' kV' else split_part(voltage,';',1) || ' V' end as voltage from planet_osm_line where "power"='line' or "power"='minor_line') as power
(select way,power from planet_osm_point where power='tower' or "power"='pole') as power_towers

(select way, case when oneway in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else oneway end as oneway from planet_osm_line where oneway is not null and (highway is not null or railway is not null or waterway is not null) ) as directions
(select way,admin_level from planet_osm_roads where "boundary"='administrative' and admin_level in ('2') ) as admin

(select way,highway,aeroway,aerialway,name,ref,admin_level,char_length(ref) as length, case when bridge in ('yes','true','1') then 'yes'::text else bridge end as bridge from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL and admin_level IS NULL and (name is not null or ref is not null) ) as roads
(select way,place,name from planet_osm_point where place in ('suburb','village','large_village','hamlet','locality') ) as placenames

(select way,place, case when translate(population, '0123456789', '')='' then population::numeric else 0 end as numericpop from planet_osm_point where place in ('city','metropolis','town','large_town','small_town') and (capital is null or capital<>'yes') order by numericpop desc) as placenamessymbols

(select way,place,upper(name),name,case when translate(population, '0123456789', '')='' then population::numeric else 0 end as numericpop from planet_osm_point where place in ('city','metropolis','town','large_town','small_town') and (capital is null or capital<>'yes') order by numericpop) as placenames
(select way,place,upper(name),name,ref from planet_osm_point where place in ('country') or (place in ('city','metropolis','town') and capital='yes') ) as placenames

(select * from planet_osm_point where barrier IS NOT NULL or amenity IS NOT NULL or tourism is NOT NULL or information is NOT NULL or railway is NOT NULL or "natural" is NOT NULL or highway is NOT NULL or aeroway is NOT NULL or aerialway is NOT NULL or power_source is NOT NULL or man_made is NOT NULL or shop is NOT NULL or historic is NOT NULL or ruins='yes' or military='bunker' or noexit in ('yes', 'no')) as amenity

(select * from planet_osm_polygon where barrier IS NOT NULL or amenity IS NOT NULL or tourism is NOT NULL or information is NOT NULL or railway is NOT NULL or "natural" is NOT NULL or highway is NOT NULL or aeroway is NOT NULL or aerialway is NOT NULL or man_made is NOT NULL or shop is NOT NULL or historic is NOT NULL or ruins='yes' or military='bunker') as amenity

(select way,amenity,highway,leisure,landuse,man_made,"tower:type","natural",place,tourism,information,ele,historic,ruins,name,ref,shop,military,aeroway,'yes'::text as point from planet_osm_point where amenity is not null or leisure is not null or landuse is not null or tourism is not null or information is not null or "natural" is not null or man_made in ('lighthouse','windmill') or place='island' or highway='motorway_junction' or military='danger_area' or aeroway='gate' or shop='bicycle' or historic is not null or ruins='yes' ) as text

(select way,aeroway,amenity,highway,leisure,landuse,man_made,"tower:type","natural",place,tourism,historic,ruins,NULL as ele,name,ref,shop,military,'no'::text as point from planet_osm_polygon where amenity is not null or leisure is not null or landuse is not null or tourism is not null or "natural" is not null or man_made in ('lighthouse','windmill') or place='island' or military='danger_area' or shop='bicycle' or historic is not null or ruins='yes' ) as text

(select way,way_area,name, landuse, "natural" from planet_osm_polygon where name is not null and (waterway is null or waterway <> 'riverbank') and admin_level is null order by z_order,way_area desc ) as text
(select way, ref, name, lcn, ncn, rcn, rcn_ref, ncn_ref, lcn_ref, network from planet_osm_line where ref is not null and (lcn is not null or ncn is not null or rcn is not null)) as cycleway
(select way,name, protect_class from planet_osm_polygon where (boundary='national_park' or boundary='protected_area') and protect_class is not null) as boundary
